bill.title: Relating To Land Use.
bill.description: Transfers the Office of Planning and Sustainable Development from the Department of Business, Economic Development, and Tourism to the Department of Land and Natural Resources. (SD1)

history.action: The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 02-06-23 10:45AM; Conference Room 211 & Videoconference.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS and be recommitted. The votes in WAM were as follows: 10 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Keith-Agaran, Aquino, Inouye, Kanuha, Kidani, Kim, Lee, Moriwaki, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) DeCoite, Shimabukuro, Wakai.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 121) as amended (SD 1), with recommendation of recommittal to WAM.
Report adopted, as amended (SD 1) and recommitted to WAM.
The committee(s) on EET/WTL has scheduled a public hearing on 02-14-23 1:00PM; Conference Room 229 & Videoconference.

The committee(s) on EET recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in EET were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) DeCoite, Wakai, Kim; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Fukunaga, Fevella.

The committee(s) on WTL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in WTL were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Inouye, Elefante, McKelvey; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Chang, Fevella.
Reported from EET/WTL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 534) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading and referral to WAM.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading and referred to WAM.

subjects.subject_name: Office of Planning and Sustainable Development

votes.desc: Senate Ways and Means: Passed, With Amendments And Be Recommitted
Senate Water and Land: Passed, Unamended
Senate Energy, Economic Development, and Tourism: Passed, Unamended

calendar.description: Senate Energy, Economic Development, and Tourism Hearing
